metadata.name: Python Spawning Pretty TTY on Windows
metadata.comment: Detects python spawning a pretty tty

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('python.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('python3.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('python2.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('import pty')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.spawn(')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('from pty import spawn'))))

output.summary: Detects python spawning a pretty tty
